overview:
Dr. Michael Gosch is currently the CEO of the XPERD AG.

His interest belongs to everything that is new and in the interdisciplinary field. Finding the right solution to a problem is his passion. His entrepreneurial sense makes him find business opportunities. Building and forming a company from scratch, establishing processes and a working organization is where he is good at.

He has multiple start-up experiences. Barely started with his PhD in 2000, he became the first employee in a biotechnology start-up trying to sequence DNA on a single molecule level in Sweden. After holding different leading positions in the biotec start-up, he was asked to build up a R&D unit in Switzerland in 2003, building innovative optical detection applications. From 2005 on, he worked as a top management consultant, mainly in the field of restructuring, optimization and growth of various SMEs. Lately, he held a position as managing director of a medical technology start-up building and managing up to 10 sleep laboratories all over Germany.

With more than nine years of experience in leading positions and eight years start-up experience, he dedicates his time to find new business opportunities and innovative challenges.
